item.description:
Studio Mantra + Generation Desi.com

Present...

DHOOM! NYE 2013

THE TEAM THAT BROUGHT YOU THE HOTTEST SOUTH ASIAN EVENTS IN BOSTON NOW PRESENT... DHOOM NYE 2013!
Join us NYE 2013 For a one of a kind bollywood | bhangra party

At the stylish marriott courtyard on the charles river waterfront in the penthouse ballroom, top floor! scenic veiws of the boston skyline
forget the suburbs, stay in the city and celebrate in style with 250+ south asian young professionals!

Sounds by DJ Rohit playing the hottest bollywood | bhangra | remixes

Event Features:
- Complimentary Dinner
- NYE Party Favors
- Champagne Toast
- TOP Shelf Liquor
- Party Till 2AM!
- free Parking
ONLY $30 PER PERSON + DISCOUNTS FOR LARGE GROUPS!

TICKETS @ STUDIOMANTRABOSTON.COM + Generation desi.com
item.name: Dhoom! Bollywood Bhangra NYE Bash on the Waterfront
